message: feat: enhance portfolio documentation with multi-theme capture
title: feat: enhance portfolio documentation with multi-theme capture
content:
FEATURE: feat: enhance portfolio documentation with multi-theme capture

- Light/dark mode screenshot capture for comprehensive visual timeline

- Enhanced JSON structure for future 21st.dev timeline component integration

- Timeline markdown with theme comparisons for easy review
